data.author: Marcelo Lazaroni

changelog.release_notes:
See the time in a different way.

Instead of saying "I studied for 2 hours" say "It studied for almost 10% of my day" 

The background colour changes from green to red as the time goes past, just like a battery. And if you want to know the real time, date or weather just flick your wrist and there you go! 

And it is open source! Here is the code: https://github.com/lazaronijunior/Percentage-Watchface

data.description:
See the time in a different way.

Seeing time as a percentage you can be more aware of how much of your time you are dedicating to each thing.

The background colour changes from green to red as the time goes past, just like a battery, so you know when your day is about to finish. 

And if you want to know the time, date or weather just flick your wrist and there you go! 

Aaaand it is open source! Here is the code: https://github.com/lazaronijunior/Percentage-Watchface

The background colour changes from green to red as the time goes past, just like a battery. And if you want to know the real time, date or weather just flick your wrist and there you go! 

And it is open source! Here is the code: https://github.com/lazaronijunior/Percentage-Watchface

data.title: Percentage
